341. Profiling Interface


Up: The MPI Tool Information Interface Next: Deprecated Functions Previous: Return Codes for the MPI Tool Information Interface

All requirements for the profiling interfaces, as described in Section Profiling Interface , also apply to the MPI tool information interface. All rules, guidelines, and recommendations from Section Profiling Interface apply equally to calls defined as part of the MPI tool information interface.
